title: Paris-Roubaix Plotlines: Forecasts for Rain, ‘That’ Chicane, Flexed Biceps, Audacious Quests, and More
content:
From Pogačar's rulebook-defying debut and Kopecky's cobblestone flex to reports of rain and more – here's what to watch for in the wildest weekend of the year.

Read the full article at Paris-Roubaix Plotlines: Forecasts for Rain, ‘That’ Chicane, Flexed Biceps, Audacious Quests, and More on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
